Aspen Mountain in Aspen, Colorado. Winter 2016.

Welcome.

I’m Tony, a first-year graduate student in the Biology department at the University of Washington in Seattle. I’m working on using techinques from data science to better predict biological responses to climate change in the Buckley lab. I graduated Tufts University in Medford, MA in 2015, where I got my B.S. in Computer Science and Biology.

I’m an outdoor enthusiast and naturalist. I like to run, hike, backpack, and climb high peaks. I’m from Rhode Island, and I have lived in Colorado and Massachusetts.

You can e-mail me at tony.cannistra@gmail.com.
